name: Time in Time
description: Time in Time is a side scroller puzzle-platformer game where you control everything with timers..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual/Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 500 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i3/i5 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 600/700 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
